'''v0.4.0 alpha''' is a major update to ''[[Minecraft: Pocket Edition]]'' that was released on September 6 and 13, 2012. It adds notable features such as [[bed]]s, [[trapdoor]]s, [[creeper]]s, new [[food]], and [[farming]] items, as well as other changes and fixes.<ref name=":0">{{citation|url=https://www.mojang.com/2012/09/minecraft-pocket-edition-0-4-0-is-out/|title=Minecraft — Pocket Edition 0.4.0 is OUT!|website=Mojang|date=September 6, 2012|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20150925205525/https://www.mojang.com/2012/09/minecraft-pocket-edition-0-4-0-is-out/}}</ref> This update is also the first public release for Amazon's Fire devices.

=== Blocks ===
{{rewrite|section=1}}
'''[[File:Red Bed (N) JE1.png|32px]] [[File:Red Bed (item) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bed]]s'''
* Used to skip the [[Daylight cycle|night]] and set the player's spawn point.
'''[[File:Oak Trapdoor (D) JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Trapdoor]]s'''
* Used as a 1×1 barrier that can be opened by hand.
* Currently available only in creative inventory.
'''[[File:Stone Bricks JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Stone bricks]]'''
* Only available in Survival mode.
'''[[File:Grass BE1.png|32px]] [[Grass]]'''
* Only obtainable through inventory editors.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Flint and Steel JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Flint and steel]]'''
* Used to ignite TNT.
'''[[File:Wooden Hoe JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Stone Hoe JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Iron Hoe JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Golden Hoe JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[File:Diamond Hoe JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Hoe]]s'''
* Used to till dirt and grass blocks into farmland.
'''Food-related items'''
* [[File:Apple JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Apple]]s
** Sometimes drops from oak leaves.
** Restores {{hp|2}} health.
* [[File:Bread JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Bread]]
** Can be crafted with three wheat
** Restores {{hp|2}} health.
* [[File:Mushroom Stew JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Mushroom stew]]
** Can be crafted with one [[bowl]], one [[brown mushroom]] and one [[red mushroom]]
** Restores {{hp|4}} health.
* [[File:Raw Beef JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Raw beef]]
** Obtained by killing [[cow]]s
** Restores {{hp|1}} health.
* [[File:Steak JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Steak]]
** Obtained by smelting the raw beef in furnace
** Restores {{hp|4}} health.
* [[File:Raw Chicken JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Raw chicken]]
** Obtained by killing [[chicken]]s
** Restores {{hp|1}} health.
* [[File:Cooked Chicken JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cooked chicken]]
** Obtained by smelting the raw chicken in furnace
** Restores {{hp|3}} health.
* [[File:Raw Porkchop JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Raw porkchop]]
** Obtained by killing [[pig]]s
** Restores {{hp|1}} health.
* [[File:Cooked Porkchop JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cooked porkchop]]
** Obtained by smelting the raw porkchop in furnace
** Restores {{hp|4}} health.
'''Miscellaneous'''

'''[[File:Wheat Seeds JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wheat seeds]]'''
* Obtained by using a [[hoe]] on [[grass block]]s.
* Used to put [[wheat crops]] on [[farmland]]s.
'''[[File:Egg JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Egg]]s'''
* Used as a throwable entity.
* Only obtainable through inventory editors.

== Changes ==

=== Blocks ===
'''[[File:Chest (S) BE1.png|32px]] [[Chest]]s'''
* Can now be crafted with eight wooden planks.
* Are now functional in Survival mode, and are able to store other items and blocks in them.
'''[[Farmland]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Farmland BE2.png|32px]] to [[File:Farmland JE3 BE3.png|32px]].
* Now can be created by tilling a [[dirt]] or [[grass block]]s by using [[hoe]].
'''[[Fence gate]]'''
* Changed texture from [[File:Oak Fence Gate BE1.png|32px]] to [[File:Oak Fence Gate JE2.png|32px]].
'''[[File:TNT JE2 BE1.png|32px]] [[TNT]]'''
* Can now be crafted with five [[gunpowder]]s and four [[sand]].
* Now requires [[flint and steel]] to ignite.

=== Items ===
'''[[File:Snowball (inventory) BE1.png|32px]] [[Snowball]]s'''
* Can now be thrown.
'''[[File:Gunpowder JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Gunpowder]]'''
* Can now be used to craft TNT.
'''[[File:Wheat JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Wheat]]'''
* Now obtainable via [[farming]] 
* Can be used to craft [[bread]].
'''[[File:Red Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Rose red]]'''
* {{Version exclusive}}: is now obtainable by smelting [[red mushroom]]s.
* Can now be crafted into red [[wool]].
'''[[File:Orange Dye (inventory) BE1.png|32px]] [[Orange dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with rose red and [[dandelion yellow]].
* Can now be crafted into orange wool.
'''[[File:Lime Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Lime dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with cactus green and [[bone meal]].
* Can now be crafted into lime wool.
'''[[File:Green Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cactus green]]'''
* Can now be crafted into green wool.
'''[[File:Cyan Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Cyan dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with cactus green and [[lapis lazuli]].
* Can now be crafted into cyan wool.
'''[[File:Light Blue Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Light blue dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with bone meal and lapis lazuli.
* Can now be crafted into light blue wool.
'''[[File:Purple Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Purple dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with rose red and lapis lazuli.
* Can now be crafted into purple wool.
'''[[File:Magenta Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Magenta dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with two rose red, lapis lazuli, and bone meal.
* Can now be crafted into magenta wool.
'''[[File:Pink Dye JE1 BE1.png|32px]] [[Pink dye]]'''
* Can now be crafted with rose red and bone meal.
* Can now be crafted into pink wool.

=== Mobs ===
* Limited the total number of any given [[mob]] type.
* Animal spawning (being worked on){{info needed}}
'''[[File:Chicken JE1 BE1.png|33px]] [[Chicken]]s'''
* Now drop [[raw chicken]].
'''[[File:Cow JE4 BE1.png|33px]] [[Cow]]s'''
* Now drop [[raw beef]].
'''[[File:Pig JE2 BE1.png|33px]] [[Pig]]s'''
* Now drop [[raw porkchops]].
'''[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|33px]] [[Zombie]]s'''
* Now drop 0-1 [[feathers]] with chance 25℅ when upon death. {{Info needed}}
'''[[File:Creeper JE3 BE1.png|26px]] [[Creeper]]s'''
* Now spawn naturally.

=== World generation ===
'''[[File:Oak BE6.png|64px]] [[Oak tree]]s'''
* Now generate with oak logs instead of spruce logs.

=== Gameplay ===
* Increased the length of the [[daylight cycle]] from 14,400 ticks (12 minutes) to 19,200 ticks (16 minutes).
* When using an item, the player’s movement speed is decreased.
* All targetable blocks are now instantly mineable in Creative mode.
** Bedrock is also breakable, allowing for access to the [[void]] without external editing.

=== General ===
* The game no longer attempts to verify the player's license, allowing devices that do not own ''Minecraft'' in their respective app store to play the game.

== Fixes ==

'''15 bugs fixed'''

* Monsters could spawn indoors.
* Added fall damage for clients.
* Players could hit each other far away.
* Incorrect [[bow]] rendering in third person view.
* Missing particles after critical [[arrow]]s
* [[Stairs]] reverted to their basic blocks when destroyed
* Drawing the bow could destroy certain blocks ([[flower]]s, [[torch]]es), or interact with blocks.
* The game crashes if the player is killed while having charging a bow.
* Connecting players could die in Creative mode.
* Spruce leaves sometimes use the [[crafting table]] texture on all sides when dropped as an item or held in the player's hand.
* Wrong crafting table size for Xperia Play
* Bow doesn't take damage when used.
* Non-dark brown [[tree]] trunks are now added back to the game (you may need to start a new world as host).
* Destroying a [[door]] could leave half a door.
* Spider death sound was missing on iOS.</onlyinclude>
